name: Gregory Vallim
subtitle: Full-stack developer passionate about creating innovative and impactful solutions. Specialized in modern technologies with focus on performance, security and exceptional user experience.

experience.title: Experience

mission.description: Create digital experiences that transform lives and businesses through technology. I believe that every project should be an opportunity to innovate and positively impact the world around us.
